metadata.title: ChinaLink Express | China-Africa Sourcing & Shipping
metadata.description: ChinaLink Express - Your trusted logistics partner for sourcing, purchasing and shipping goods from China to Mali and Africa. Free quote.
metadata.keywords: China Africa sourcing, China Mali shipping, freight forwarding China Africa, air freight China Bamako, international logistics

hero.title: ChinaLink Express - Your Logistics Partner
hero.subtitle: Your logistics bridge between China and Africa. Air and sea shipping with real-time tracking.

about.title: About ChinaLink Express
about.description1: Founded in 2019, ChinaLink Express has become a major player in international logistics, specializing in trade between China, Mali and Africa. We offer complete solutions for purchasing, shipping and delivery of goods.
about.description2: Our mission is to simplify international trade by offering complete purchasing, shipping and payment solutions, allowing our clients to focus on their core business.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions to simplify your trade with China

sourcing.title: SOURCING
sourcing.description: We manage your purchases from Chinese suppliers with professionalism and transparency.

airFreight.title: AIR FREIGHT
airFreight.description: Fast delivery by air for your urgent shipments worldwide.

seaFreight.title: SEA FREIGHT
seaFreight.description: Economical solution for transporting large volumes by sea.

payment.description: We facilitate secure payment to your suppliers in China via Alipay, WeChat Pay and other methods.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.helpDescription: Our support team is available 24/7 to answer all your questions.

0.question: What types of goods can you ship?
0.answer: We ship almost all types of goods, except dangerous items or those prohibited by law. Contact us for more details about your specific items +8618851725957.

1.question: How long does air freight take?
1.answer: Air freight generally takes between 14 to 21 business days from China to Bamako. We also offer express options for deliveries in 2-5 days.

2.question: How long does sea freight take?
2.answer: Sea freight generally takes between 60 to 75 business days from China to Bamako. This is the most economical option for large volumes.

3.question: How does supplier payment work?
3.answer: We facilitate secure payment to your suppliers in China via Alipay, WeChat Pay, credit cards and other methods. You pay the amount to us based on the daily rate and we settle with your suppliers.

4.question: How do I top up my ChinaLink Express account?
4.answer: You can top up your customer account via Orange Money, Wave and Cash. Funds are credited instantly and allow you to pay for your shipments more quickly.

5.question: Do you offer real-time tracking?
5.answer: Yes, all our shipments are equipped with a real-time tracking system accessible from your customer dashboard in our mobile app 24/7.

contact.title: Contact Us

prohibitedItems.title: Prohibited and Restricted Items
prohibitedItems.subtitle: List of items that cannot be shipped or require special authorization

prohibited.title: Strictly Prohibited Items
prohibited.description: Cannot be shipped under any circumstances

note.title: Important note
note.description: This list is not exhaustive. Contact us to verify if your item can be shipped.

priceDecrease.question: Can rates be revised downward?
priceDecrease.answer: No, our rates are fixed in most cases. However, in some cases, we may apply discounts at our discretion.

priceIncrease.question: Can rates be revised upward?
priceIncrease.answer: Yes, when certain items require special customs clearance. In this case, the package owner may be required to make an additional payment to support the additional clearance procedure.

advancePayment.question: Does freight price need to be paid in advance?
advancePayment.answer: Generally, the freight price must be paid upon arrival of the package. However, in some cases, a deposit or even full payment may be required depending on the owner's profile or the characteristics of the package to be transported.

customsClearance.question: Do I need to clear customs upon arrival of my goods?
customsClearance.answer: No, our rates already include customs fees. However, in some particular cases, customs clearance may require additional steps on the part of the owner of the transported package.

insurance.question: What guarantees do you offer in case of loss or damage?
insurance.answer: We have insurance covering 100% of cases of damage and loss. However, packaging and conditioning of fragile items are the responsibility of the supplier or package owner. In case of damage due to inadequate conditioning, we exclude our liability.

prohibitedItems.question: Are there prohibited items?
prohibitedItems.answer: The following goods are not accepted under any circumstances: Animals, Antiques (breakable and/or fragile), Asbestos, Ingots, Currency, Firearms, their parts and ammunition, Furs, Hazardous and combustible materials (as defined in IATA regulations), Human remains, including ashes, Precious metals and stones, Narcotics (illegal), Goods whose transport is prohibited by any law, regulation and statute of a federal, state or local government of a country to or through which the shipment may be transported. In some countries such as China, lithium batteries, power banks, drones, electronic cigarettes, lighters with gas, electronic lighters, dangerous products, contraband, spray products (insecticides), fire starters or gas and others are prohibited from flying due to fire risks and other security risks.

tariffDecrease.question: Can rates be revised downward?
tariffDecrease.answer: No, our rates are fixed in most cases. However, in some cases, we may apply discounts at our discretion.

tariffIncrease.question: Can rates be revised upward?
tariffIncrease.answer: Yes, when certain items require special customs clearance.

prepayment.question: Does freight price need to be paid in advance?
prepayment.answer: Generally, the freight price must be paid upon arrival of the package. However, in some cases, a deposit or even full payment may be required.

customs.question: Do I need to clear customs upon arrival of my goods?
customs.answer: No, our rates already include customs fees. However, in some particular cases, customs clearance may require additional steps.

guarantee.question: What guarantees do you offer in case of loss or damage?
guarantee.answer: We have insurance covering 100% of cases of damage and loss.

prohibited.question: What items are prohibited?
prohibited.answer: Phones, computers, lithium batteries, drones, liquids, flammable products, supplements, chemicals, weapons and spray products are restricted or prohibited.

whatIsCBM.question: What is CBM?
whatIsCBM.answer: CBM (Cubic Meter) is the volume measurement unit used for sea freight. 1 CBM = 1 cubic meter. The sea freight rate is calculated by multiplying CBM by the unit rate.

volumetricWeight.question: How do you calculate volumetric weight?
volumetricWeight.answer: Volumetric weight is calculated using the formula: (Length Ã— Width Ã— Height) Ã· 5000. The result is in kilograms. The chargeable weight is the higher of the actual weight and volumetric weight.

chargeableWeight.question: What is chargeable weight?
chargeableWeight.answer: Chargeable weight is the weight used to calculate the shipping rate. It is the maximum between your package's actual weight and its volumetric weight.

deliveryTime.question: What are the delivery times?
deliveryTime.answer: Air freight: 14-21 business days. Sea freight: 60-75 business days. Times may vary depending on exact destination and customs checks.

customsFees.question: Are customs fees included?
customsFees.answer: No, displayed rates are for transport only. Customs fees and import taxes are the recipient's responsibility and vary by country and type of goods.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept: bank transfer, Orange Money, Wave, cash, and payment via our online platform. Regular customers can benefit from a customer account with credit.

tracking.question: How can I track my shipment?
tracking.answer: You receive a tracking number as soon as your goods are shipped. Track your package in real-time via our mobile app or website in the 'Tracking' section.

phonesSea.title: Phones (prohibited by sea)
phonesSea.description: Phones cannot be shipped by sea freight.

computersSea.description: Computers cannot be shipped by sea freight.

batteries.description: Prohibited by air and sea for safety reasons.

drones.title: Drones
drones.description: Prohibited by air and sea. Requires special authorization.

liquidsSea.title: Liquids (prohibited by sea)
liquidsSea.description: Liquids cannot be shipped by sea freight.

flammable.title: Flammable Products
flammable.description: Strictly prohibited by air and sea.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect your personal data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At ChinaLink Express, we place the highest importance on protecting your personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our logistics and shipping services.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of personal data when you use our services:
items: Identification information: name, first name, ID number
Contact details: email address, phone numbers, postal address
Shipping information: delivery addresses, package details, shipment contents
Payment data: banking information, transaction history (stored securely)
Technical data: IP address, browser type, device used, cookies

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: Your personal data is used for the following purposes:
items: Service provision: processing shipments, tracking packages, managing customer accounts
Communication: sending shipping notifications, status updates, responding to inquiries
Tracking and traceability: managing ongoing shipments, shipping history
Service improvement: statistical analysis, development of new features
Legal obligations: compliance with customs and tax regulations

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement rigorous technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Our measures include SSL/TLS encryption, strict access control, regular team training, and periodic security audits.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your user experience and collect statistical data on the use of our services. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time via the consent banner or your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at contact@chinalinkexpress.com or by phone at +223 76 69 61 77. We are committed to processing your requests as soon as possible.

introduction.p1: At ChinaLink Express, we place the highest importance on protecting your personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our logistics and shipping services.
introduction.p2: We are subject to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union and applicable local data protection laws in the countries where we operate, including Mali and China.
introduction.p3: By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal data in accordance with this policy. We are committed to processing your data in a transparent, lawful, and secure manner.

dataCollection.p1: We collect the following types of personal data when you use our services:

items.identification: Identification information: name, first name, ID number
items.contact: Contact details: email address, phone numbers, postal address
items.shipping: Shipping information: delivery addresses, package details, shipment contents
items.payment: Payment data: banking information, transaction history (stored securely)
items.technical: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device used, cookies
items.usage: Usage data: shipping history, service preferences, communications with our support

dataCollection.p2: We only collect data necessary for the provision of our services and retain it for the legally required period or as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.

dataUsage.p1: Your personal data is used for the following purposes:

items.services: Service provision: processing shipments, tracking packages, managing customer accounts
items.communication: Communication: sending shipping notifications, status updates, responding to inquiries
items.tracking: Tracking and traceability: managing ongoing shipments, shipping history
items.improvement: Service improvement: statistical analysis, development of new features
items.security: Security: fraud detection and prevention, transaction security
items.legal: Legal obligations: compliance with customs and tax regulations

dataProtection.p1: We implement rigorous technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

items.encryption: SSL/TLS encryption for all sensitive data transmissions
items.access: Strict access control: only authorized employees can access data
items.training: Regular training of our teams on security best practices
items.audits: Periodic security audits and penetration testing

dataProtection.p3: In the event of a data breach likely to affect your rights and freedoms, we commit to informing you within the legal deadlines and taking all necessary measures to limit the impacts.

thirdParty.p1: We may share your data with third parties in the following cases:

items.carriers: Carriers and logistics partners: to ensure delivery of your packages
items.payment: Payment providers: for secure processing of your transactions
items.authorities: Competent authorities: to comply with legal and customs obligations
items.service: Service providers: cloud hosting, data analysis, customer support

thirdParty.p2: All our partners are subject to strict confidentiality agreements and can only use your data within the scope of the services they provide on our behalf.
thirdParty.p3: We never sell your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.

rights.p1: In accordance with the GDPR and applicable laws, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data
items.rectification: Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data
items.erasure: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten): request deletion of your data
items.portability: Right to data portability: receive your data in a structured format
items.objection: Right to object: object to the processing of your data in certain cases
items.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent: withdraw your consent at any time

rights.p2: To exercise these rights, please contact us at the details provided below. We will respond to your request within one month, in accordance with regulations.

cookies.p1: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your user experience and collect statistical data on the use of our services.
cookies.p2: We use the following categories of cookies:

items.essential: Essential cookies: necessary for the website to function (session, cart)
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: audience measurement and user behavior analysis
items.functional: Functional cookies: remembering your preferences (language, settings)
items.marketing: Marketing cookies: advertising personalization (with your consent)

cookies.p3: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time via the consent banner or your browser settings. Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.

contact.p1: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us:
contact.p2: We are committed to processing your requests as soon as possible and providing you with a clear and complete response.
